entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
